book.synopsis: This invaluable new edition incorporates additional fragments contained in the appendix of the second edition, and includes some further discoveries, recent research on the relative placing of certain papyrus fragments, and an updated index of names.
book.title_long: Theogonia, Opera et Dies, Scutum, Fragmenta Selecta (Oxford Classical Texts)
book.dimensions: Height: 5.06 Inches, Length: 0.71 Inches, Weight: 0.7495716908 Pounds, Width: 7.63 Inches
